column4: does the ubuntu 9.04 dvd come with both the 386 and 64 versions?
Does this matter?  I have a 64 bit machine but want to re-install grub using a 9.04 server dvd.  specifically from the Ubuntu Server book
I don't want to download a whole nother iso, I have 9.10 versions of Ubuntu, Kubuntu and Xubuntu dled and burned.
afaik you can install just about any grub you want
